## Libraries
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
```

## Data 
```{r}
countries <- read_csv("countries.csv") 
names(countries) <- gsub(" ", "", names(countries)) 

countries <- countries %>%
  select(Country, Region, `Population(millions)`, GDPperCapita,
         TotalEcologicalFootprint, TotalBiocapacity, 
         BiocapacityDeficitorReserve) %>%
  mutate(Indic = ifelse(BiocapacityDeficitorReserve < 0, 0, 1))
```
